scripts.script_content:
I've got Kay Starr up next, singing Wheel of Fortune. This one always gets me wondering about fate and chance - does spinning that wheel really determine your path in life? Or is it all just how you play the hand dealt to you?

And here's Kay Starr with Wheel of Fortune!

Now we've got Patti Page singing Tennessee Waltz, and I have to wonder if the folks in her song ever made it back home safely after their night of dancing at that honky-tonk out on the highway. Stay safe tonight wherever you wander under those stars up there! 

(1 sentence)
